about.title: What is <0>GIED</0>?
about.description: GIED Esports was born to professionalize and raise the level of sporting events in the Balearic Islands, providing a modern, efficient, and people-centered vision.

leadership.title: Foundation and Leadership
leadership.description: Founded in December 2021 by Gabriel and Miguel Quetglas Bover, with a solid family and professional structure.

management.title: Comprehensive Management
management.description: Specialists in the creation, planning, and 360ยบ management of events and public and private sports facilities.

dna.title: Sports DNA
dna.description: Team formed by athletes with real experience in organizing tournaments, leagues, camps, and championships.

expert.title: Expert Team
expert.description: We understand sports from the inside to offer effective solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: At GIED Esports we work with a wide variety of formats, always adapting to the client's needs and guaranteeing maximum professionalism.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: How we bring your idea to reality

conceptualization.title: Conceptualization
conceptualization.description: Design of the base idea and definition of objectives.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Comprehensive logistics: spaces, materials and permits.

coordination.title: Coordination
coordination.description: Efficient management of human teams and providers.

execution.title: Execution
execution.description: On-site direction of the event guaranteeing its development.

evaluation.title: Evaluation
evaluation.description: Analysis of results and feedback for continuous improvement.

privateTournaments.title: Private Tournaments
privateTournaments.description: Organization of tournaments for companies, clubs or associations. We bet on healthy, fun and structured competition for all levels.

federatedCompetitions.title: Federated Competitions
federatedCompetitions.description: Close collaboration with sports federations for the creation and management of official competitions, strictly complying with current regulations.

sportsCamps.title: Sports Camps
sportsCamps.description: Design of improvement, mixed or recreational camps. Ideal for holiday periods, focused on technical improvement and fun.

sportsClinics.title: Sports Clinics
sportsClinics.description: Training days taught by qualified professionals, oriented to specific technical learning and the transmission of values.

popularSportsDays.title: Popular Sports Days
popularSportsDays.description: Events open to all ages to encourage physical activity and family coexistence through sport.

popularRaces.title: Popular Races and Events
popularRaces.description: Comprehensive organization of races and non-federated sports events, taking care of every logistical detail, permits and safety of the participants.

schoolSports.title: School Sports
schoolSports.description: Management and coordination of extracurricular and sports activities for children and young people, promoting healthy habits, companionship and respect.

leagues.title: Leagues and Championships
leagues.description: Organization and management of regular leagues and specific championships, both federated and amateur, with adapted competition systems.

publicFacilities.title: Public Facilities
publicFacilities.description: Comprehensive management of municipal facilities, optimizing public resources and offering citizens accessible and quality spaces.

privateFacilities.title: Private Facilities Management
privateFacilities.description: Administration and revitalization of private sports centers, focused on improving economic performance, usage rate and overall user experience.

contact.title: Tell Us Your Idea
contact.subtitle: We make it a reality.
contact.description: Regardless of the size or type of project, we invite you to present your idea to us. At GIED Esports we will be delighted to analyze it, advise you and offer you a proposal fully adapted to your needs.

footer.description: Experts in comprehensive management of sports events. We make your project a reality with professionalism, passion and commitment.
